shows.title: Art School: Still Life Painting
shows.desc:
Anyone can enjoy drawing, and this is a class for every ability. Join experienced illustrator Fred Apps to draw or paint still life sets with some fun and plenty of encouragement. Come and take your next step or your first steps.

Places Limited: first come first serve

shows.title: Art School: Landscape Painting
shows.desc:
Outdoor Art School Session. Meet at the Studio.
Join experienced illustrator Fred Apps and open your eyes to the festival site, with sketches of anything from bikes to benches and a longer study of whatever catches our imagination. Everyone welcome! If you are a regular artist or a complete beginner come and have some fun.
Places Limited: first come first serve
